title: New Year 2026 cinematic portraits made easy: 5 Top AI prompts for ChatGPT, Gemini, and Grok
snippet: Celebrate New Year 2026 with cinematic AI portraits! In this article, we explore how to transform selfies and create hyper-realistic, high-fashion visuals with fireworks, luxury outfits, and festive vibes. Try viral AI prompts for stunning, social-media-ready New Year portraits.

title: Google Doodle today celebrates Happy New Year 2026 fresh beginnings visuals: Here's how
snippet: Google celebrates the New Year 2026 with a fresh Doodle symbolising new beginnings. The artwork highlights January 1 as a time for reflection and resolutions, marking the start of the calendar year across cultures through a fresh notebook, pen, coffee, skipping rope and other illustrations.

title: Redmi Note 15 to Oppo Reno 15: These 5 phones are set to debut in January 2026
snippet: Several smartphones are set to launch in January in India, including the Redmi Note 15 and Realme 16 Pro series on January 6, followed by the Poco M8 5G and Motorola Signature series.

title: AI pioneer Yoshua Bengio warns against giving rights to chatbots, says we may need to shut them down
snippet: Yoshua Bengio warned against granting rights to AI, likening it to giving citizenship to hostile aliens. He emphasizes the need for control over AI, which is showing signs of self-preservation, and cautions that such rights could prevent humans from shutting down harmful systems.

title: India’s broadband user base crosses 100 crore after six-fold growth since 2014: All you need to know
snippet: The number of broadband subscribers in India has surpassed 100 crore, according to TRAI. The increase from 131.49 million in 2015 to 1 billion in 2025 reflects significant advancements in connectivity and digital infrastructure, aided by the National Broadband Mission 2.0.

title: iPhone 17 Pro Max gets over  ₹11,000 discount ahead of New Year: how to grab the deal
snippet: Apple's iPhone 17 Pro Max is now priced at  ₹1,38,490, a discount of over  ₹10,000 from its launch price. Additional offers include a  ₹4,000 instant bank discount, reducing the effective price to  ₹1,34,490.

title: iPhone 16 gets steep price cut ahead of New Year, available for under  ₹60,000: here's how to grab the deal
snippet: The iPhone 16 has dropped below  ₹60,000 during Vijay Sales’ Apple Days sale, thanks to bank discounts and exchange offers. The phone runs on Apple's A18 silicone and comes with support for Apple Intelligence features.

title: Samsung reportedly pauses One UI 8 rollout for Galaxy Watch 4 series: here’s why
snippet: The rollout of OneUI 8 for Galaxy Watch 4 models has been halted due to user complaints about battery drain, unresponsive touch, and sensor issues. Many users report not receiving the update, indicating it may be paused pending resolution of these problems.

title: Is Sam Altman and Jony Ive's first AI device a pen? Here's what the leak suggests
snippet: A new leak has revealed that OpenAI's first AI device which is being built in partnership with Jony Ive could be a pen. The manufacturing of the device is also said to be moving to foxconn.

snippet: The pull feature allowed users to request funds from each other. Specific merchant UPI IDs could also initiate payments through this. However, the feature became a problem after fraudsters started using it to dupe unsuspecting consumers.

title: ETtech State of Startups Survey: Startups expect to pivot to an AI avatar this year
snippet: The poll recorded responses from 70 stakeholders, of whom 60% were founders and top-level executives at new-age startups and tech companies across consumer internet, financial services, enterprise, AI, retail and logistics sectors. The rest were VC and private equity investors.

title: GCCs to ditch hiring surge for AI, cyber skills in 2026 : Experts
snippet: India’s Global Capability Centres (GCCs) are shifting away from mass hiring and focusing instead on specialised skills in AI, cloud, and cybersecurity as they head into 2026, a move that could reshape both job creation and the future of the country’s tech workforce. title: Ola Electric business head for cell ops Vishal Chaturvedi resigns
snippet: In his resignation letter addressed to Ola Electric founder Bhavish Aggarwal, he said the decision was taken due to personal commitments and thanked the leadership and colleagues for their support during his tenure. The company has not announced a replacement for the role in the filing.

title: Grok's Business and Enterprise tiers: Here’s all you need to know
snippet: The tiers position Grok as an enterprise-ready AI assistant for secure and collaborative work at scale. It is suitable for small and medium businesses under a ‘self-serve’ process.

title: 50,000 gig workers participate in strike in Hyderabad, unions claim
snippet: About 50,000 of the total two lakh gig workers in Hyderabad participated in the strike called on Wednesday by the unions demanding better payouts and improved working conditions, TGPWU president Shaik Salauddin claimed.

title: China AI chip firm Biren raises $717 million in Hong Kong IPO
